data_table.description: This subject sample mapping file contains a mapping of study subject IDs to sample IDs. Samples are the final preps submitted for sequencing. For example, if one patient (subject ID) gave one sample, and that sample was processed differently to generate 2 sequencing runs, there would be two rows, both using the same subject ID, but having 2 unique sample IDs. The data table also includes sample use and a STUDY variable that lists the substudy accessions. The substudies are Burkitt Lymphoma Genome Sequencing Project (BLGSP), HIV+ Tumor Molecular Characterization Project - Cervical Cancer (HTMCP - CC), HIV+ Tumor Molecular Characterization Project - Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (HTMCP - DLBCL), HIV+ Tumor Molecular Characterization Project - Lung Cancer (HTMCP - LC), Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma - Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (NHL - DLBCL), and Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma - Follicular Lymphoma (NHL - FL). There are 2 other substudies for which there are no samples at this time. They are the Medulloblastoma (MB) and Office of Cancer Genomics (OCG) Grants - RC1 Human Lung Carcinogenesis substudies.

variable.name: STUDY
variable.description: Study cohort and dbGaP substudy accession

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_DNA_WholeGenome: Whole genome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing; Seq_miRNA: Sequencing of microRNA
